entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023
